title: fc252306.Win10SG697.001
frontText: You have to identify the IPv6 address of the computer. How can you perform this?
backText: Use Ipconfig, or from the network connection status, click Detail

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.002
frontText: You have a dual‐boot machine. How can you configure which operating system will boot up by default?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.003
frontText: You are asked to migrate all profiles and user files from machine1 to machine2. Which utility will allow you to identify how much space is required to complete the migration?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.004
frontText: You have to identify which applications were installed during the past week. What action should you perform?
backText: From Reliability Monitor, review the informational events.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.005
frontText: Which utility is used to prevent websites from displaying pop‐up windows?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.006
frontText: Which command‐line utility can be used to encrypt files on NTFS volumes?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.007
frontText: True or false: You cannot have a folder or file compressed and encrypted at the same time.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.008
frontText: True or false: A striped volume is fault tolerant.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.009
frontText: You have to make sure that access to a folder is logged. What type of auditing should be configured?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.010
frontText: You have to prepare a reference computer for imaging. What tool should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.011
frontText: You need to configure Internet Explorer to allow a user to access web pages that do not have a rating. What settings should you modify?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.012
frontText: True or false: By default, the Administrator user account is disabled.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.013
frontText: You mount a Windows 10 image and modify the contents of the image. You need to restore the image to its original state. Which tool would you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.014
frontText: Which utility is used to configure and manage hard disks?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.015
frontText: You need to identify which applications installed on your Windows 7 systems can run Windows 10. Which application would you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.016
frontText: Which power plan should be used if you are most concerned with performance?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.017
frontText: You have a Windows 7 computer. You need to identify if it will run Windows 10. What tool should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.018
frontText: When your users get added to Microsoft Intune and get licensed, how many devices can each user add by default?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.019
frontText: What utility would you use if you need to reduce the amount of space used by storing system restore points?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.020
frontText: You have a Windows Image (WIM) file that is 2 GB. You need to copy the image to a CD. How can you accomplish this?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.021
frontText: You need to view a list of third‐party drivers installed on a WIM file. What tool should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.022
frontText: When you create an image of a computer using the Windows Sysprep utility, what file extension is given to the image file?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.023
frontText: What utility is used to edit the Registry in Windows 10?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.024
frontText: You need to ensure that Internet Explorer starts whenever an HTML file is opened. How do you configure this from the Internet properties?
backText: From the Programs tab, click Make Default.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.025
frontText: True or false: The MMC provides a common environment for snap‐ins, which are administrative tools developed by Microsoft or third‐party vendors.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.026
frontText: True or false: WDS is used for remote installations of Windows 10 on PXE‐compliant computers.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.027
frontText: What utility included with Windows 10 can be used to transfer a disk image of a Windows 10 installation image?
backText: Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD) or DISM

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.028
frontText: What utility can be used to prepare a disk image for automated deployment on client computers?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.029
frontText: What graphical utility can be used to create an answer file for automated installations?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.030
frontText: What utility displays information about the hardware that is installed on your computer?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.031
frontText: Which term is used to refer to installing corporate apps through the Windows Store?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.032
frontText: What command‐line utility can be used to configure Windows Deployment Services (WDS) on a server?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.033
frontText: You need to authenticate to the VPN server by using a smart card. Which authentication setting should you choose?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.034
frontText: You need to verify whether a specific update was installed on a Windows 10 machine. What should you do?
backText: In Windows Update, examine the update history.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.035
frontText: What is User Account Control (UAC) used for?
backText: UAC prompts the user if an action requires elevated privileges, which helps prevent malicious code from automatically running on the computer.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.036
frontText: A ______________________ is a type of profile that requires a user to use a specific profile.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.037
frontText: You want to upload a third‐party update package to Intune. What utility should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.038
frontText: What command is used to configure a Windows 10 boot order?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.039
frontText: List the four network services that are required by the WDS server.
backText: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server, Domain Name System (DNS) server, Windows Deployment Service (WDS) server, and Active Directory

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.040
frontText: What are the three main areas of configuration in Computer Management?
backText: System Tools, Storage, and Services and Applications

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.041
frontText: True or false: Shortcuts can exist in various locations, including on the Desktop, on the Start menu, and within folders.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.042
frontText: You need to back up your Encrypting File System (EFS) certificate. What command can you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.043
frontText: Which utility in Computer Management is used to create users on a Windows 10 computer?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.044
frontText: You need to prevent ActiveX controls from running in Windows Internet Explorer. Which Internet Explorer settings should you modify?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.045
frontText: On a Windows 10 machine, an Encrypting File System (EFS) key is compromised. You need to create a new EFS key. Which command should you run?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.046
frontText: You need to uninstall a program from a computer that runs Windows 10. Which Control Panel item should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.047
frontText: The ______________________ utility can be used to configure a user account to use a roaming profile.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.048
frontText: True or false: Windows XP can be upgraded directly to Windows 10.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.049
frontText: You need to identify the disk, memory, CPU, and network resources that an application is currently using. Which tool should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.050
frontText: You need to identify any hardware failures that have occurred on your Windows 10 computer in the past six months. Which tool should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.051
frontText: True or false: Internet Explorer supports only search providers that have been created by Microsoft.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.052
frontText: Define the system partition.
backText: The system partition contains your boot files, which are hardware‐related files used by the computer to determine where Windows is located. This is the active partition by default, usually the C: drive.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.053
frontText: True or false: Gadgets can be displayed only on Windows Sidebar.
backText: False. Gadgets are no longer supported in Windows 10.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.054
frontText: Which type of automated installation would you use if you do not use WDS services and want to use automated installation with a distribution server?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.055
frontText: Which Sysprep switch should you use to run the installation with no user interaction?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.056
frontText: What is the name of the answer file used to provide configuration information during an unattended install?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.057
frontText: Which utility allows you to view hardware resources, including the device's interrupt request (IRQ), I/O port address, memory address, and Direct Memory Access (DMA) settings?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.058
frontText: What is the name of utility used to create a Windows 10 image from a reference computer?
backText: Image Capture Wizard utility using the /capture option

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.059
frontText: What is a spanned volume?
backText: A spanned volume consists of disk space on two or more dynamic drives; up to 32 dynamic drives can be used in a spanned volume configuration.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.060
frontText: Which Windows 10 file system supports encryption?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.061
frontText: True or false: Internet Explorer supports the installation of add‐ons not created by Microsoft.
backText: True. Internet Explorer add‐ons can be created by any third party.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.062
frontText: What is phishing?
backText: Phishing is the act of attempting to obtain personal or financial information by creating a fraudulent email or website that appears to be from a legitimate company, such as PayPal or a bank.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.063
frontText: True or false: Internet Explorer 11 supports multiple home page tabs.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.064
frontText: What command‐line utility can you use to convert a secondary hard drive from FAT32 to NTFS?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.065
frontText: What MMC console mode can be applied to provide users with full access to window management commands but prevent them from adding new snap‐ins?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.066
frontText: What specialized components are needed when creating an answer file?
backText: The specialized components of the answer file will contain information specific to the target computer, such as domain information and network settings.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.067
frontText: How do you allow your tablets to connect to your cell phones for Internet access?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.068
frontText: You do not want to make a user a local Administrator, but you do want to give this user the right to change Windows Updates manually. How can you configure this?
backText: Modify the LGPO for Windows Update to allow the user to make changes manually.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.069
frontText: What accessibility utility can be used to enlarge screen text for users who have limited vision?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.070
frontText: You have an application called App.exe that everyone on a Windows 10 computer can use except for the Sales group. How do you stop the Sales group from accessing this one application?
backText: Create an executable rule from the Application Control Policy.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.071
frontText: What technology must be present in a computer to use ReadyDrive?
backText: Hybrid hard disks, which use flash memory technology in conjunction with mechanical hard disk technology

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.072
frontText: You need to deny one user from using USB removable devices. How do you accomplish this?
backText: Create a removable storage access policy through an LGPO.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.073
frontText: You need to set up auditing on a folder. How do you accomplish this task?
backText: From the Local Group Policy, enable Audit Object Access.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.074
frontText: You need Windows 10 machines to connect to an FTP server only when the Windows 10 machine is on the private network. How do you accomplish this?
backText: In Windows Firewall with Advanced Security, create a new rule.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.075
frontText: You want to ensure that if a service fails to load, it will attempt to restart. Which tab of the service's Properties dialog box should you use?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.076
frontText: Which operating systems can you upgrade to Windows 10?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.077
frontText: If you perform a clean install of Windows 10 to the same partition as an existing version of Windows, where will the contents of the existing Documents and Settings, Program Files, and Windows directories be placed?
backText: In the Windows.old directory on that partition

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.078
frontText: What program can you run to check the compatibility of your system, devices, and installed applications with Windows 10?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.079
frontText: What two log files are useful when troubleshooting problems related to the installation of Windows 10?
backText: The action log, \\\\Windows\\\\setupact.log, and the error log, \\\\Windows\\\\setuperr.log

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.080
frontText: What contains boot information parameters that were previously found in boot.ini in older versions of Windows?
backText: Boot Configuration Data (BCD) store. You use the bcdedit command to configure the data.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.081
frontText: What is a Windows service pack?
backText: A service pack is an update to the Windows 10 operating system that includes bug fixes and may include product enhancements.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.082
frontText: What primary utility or utilities support full editing of the Windows 10 Registry?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.083
frontText: What are the requirements needed to install DirectAccess?
backText: Windows Server 2012 R2 running the DirectAccess feature, Windows Certificate Authority server, a domain controller, IPv6, and DNS

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.084
frontText: You want to be able to share audio and video files among your family. How can you set up the network?
backText: Create a HomeGroup and move all audio and video files to the Media library.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.085
frontText: You want to be sure that the machine boots up using the Windows 10 .vhd. What do you need to configure?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.086
frontText: With Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) security, there is no preshared password key being used. You need to connect a new Windows 10 laptop to the corporate access point. How would you set up the security setting on the laptop?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.087
frontText: You want to set up a cloud‐based Active Directory. What is the name of this type of Active Directory?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.088
frontText: On a 255.255.255.240 subnet mask, what do the subnet ranges increment by in this 240 subnet mask?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.089
frontText: What commands could you use to release and renew your computer's DHCP configuration?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.090
frontText: Your service provider has assigned you the network address 192.168.154.0. You have been granted the entire range to use. What class of address have you been assigned?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.091
frontText: What can you implement to help with the slower link between the main site and the remote site?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.092
frontText: What virtualization utility can you use to create a Windows 10 testing and training environment?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.093
frontText: You want to implement another line of security on Windows 10 machines so unauthorized users can't access them. What can you implement on the Windows 10 machines?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.094
frontText: You need users to be able to connect with the network without the use of a VPN or taking over the server console. What can you implement?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.095
frontText: How can you see what applications were installed last week on a Windows 10 machine?
backText: View the informational events of Reliability Monitor.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.096
frontText: You monitor the Processor > % Processor Time counter. What average value for this counter would indicate a processor bottleneck?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.097
frontText: You have a Windows 10 machine on which you have enabled System Protection. You want the machine to retain only the last System Protection snapshot that was taken. What should you do?
backText: Run Disk Cleanup for System Restore, and then run Shadow Copies.

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.098
frontText: In what order are GPOs applied?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.099
frontText: What Windows 10 tool can be used to view the Resultant Set of Policy (RSOP) to determine what policies will be applied for a user and computer?

title: fc252306.Win10SG697.100
frontText: True or false: Each user on a Windows 10 computer can have a separate LGPO.
backText: True. Windows 10 is different from previous versions of Windows with the addition of Multiple Local Group Policy Objects (MLGPOs), including user‐specific LGPOs.
